snippet.title: Official Adam Wolfe - Episode One: The Ancient Flame (by Mad Head Games) Teaser Trailer (iOS/Steam)
snippet.description:
Adam Wolfe - Episode One: The Ancient Flame by  (iOS/Steam)

Supernatural investigator Adam Wolfe deals with the shadows of his past while solving mysterious cases in the seedy underbelly of San Francisco in this Neo-noir adventure game that offers unique puzzles, a gripping story, incredible hand-drawn art, action set-pieces and a cinematic quality to the Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure genre. 

Steam:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/483420/

iTunes Store Page:

TBA

Homepage:

http://www.madheadgames.com/games/

Twitter:

https://twitter.com/madheadgames

Facebook:

https://www.facebook.com/madheadgames
